Gods.short_description: Supreme beings or divine entities of power and worship.

Creator.short_description: Divine being responsible for universal creation.

Sovereign.short_description: Supreme ruler or governor of divine realms.

Preserver.short_description: Divine maintainer of cosmic order and existence.

Destroyer.short_description: Divine force of dissolution and transformation.

Demiurge.short_description: Craftsman deity who shapes the physical universe.

Pantheon.short_description: Collective assembly of gods within a tradition.

Deva.short_description: Hindu/Buddhist celestial being of light and power.

Oracle.short_description: Divine messenger or vessel of prophecy.

Guardian.short_description: Protective deity of places or principles.

Demigod.short_description: Being of mixed divine and mortal nature.

Trickster.short_description: Divine being embodying chaos and transformation.

Sage.short_description: Divine embodiment of wisdom and knowledge.

Warrior.short_description: Martial deity of combat and protection.

Healer.short_description: Divine restorer of harmony and health.

Judge.short_description: Divine arbiter of cosmic law and karma.

Guide.short_description: Divine conductor of souls and transitions.

Liberator.short_description: Divine breaker of bonds and limitations.

Protector.short_description: Divine guardian of realms and beings.

Artificer.short_description: Divine creator of cosmic tools and weapons.

Guardian.short_description: Divine protector of sacred spaces and principles.
